s_synopsis: On a distant planet similar to Earth, a global takeover codenamed Epsilon Plan is set into motion. Lead by the imperious king Gladebaran VII, the Imperial Army stages multiple coups upon the planet's countries and are successful in less than two weeks. The only forces capable of stopping Gladebaran VII and his army from world domination are the Skull Hornets: a small squadron of fighter pilots lead by the king's son who utilize the strongest submersible jets the people's science had ever devised.
